articles.description: Phil Foden scores twice to help Manchester City come from behind to beat Manchester United at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Foden double helps Man City fight back to win derby

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen move 10 points clear of Bayern Munich at the top of the Bundesliga following victory at 10-man Cologne.
articles.title: Alonso's Leverkusen win to go 10 points clear

articles.description: The controversy surrounding Red Bull boss Christian Horner is "driving people apart", says the father of the team's F1 champion Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Jos Verstappen says controversy 'driving team apart'

articles.description: Marcus Smith returns to the England squad before their Six Nations match against Ireland after recovering from a calf injury.
articles.title: Smith returns to England squad after calf injury

articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James becomes the first NBA player to reach 40,000 career regular-season points.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James passes 40,000-point mark but LA Lakers lose to Denver Nuggets

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers laments "really poor officiating" in Celtic's 2-0 Scottish Premiership loss to Hearts.
articles.title: Celtic loss 'refereed outside the field' - Rodgers

articles.description: Great Britain's Jemma Reekie claims her first major medal by winning 800m silver in front of her home crowd at the World Indoor Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: World Athletics Indoor Championships 2024: Great Britain's Jemma Reekie wins 800m silver

articles.description: Brentford target Josh Sargent as they prepare for potential Ivan Toney exit, Liverpool open Andrew Robertson contract talks, Man City eye AC Milan teenager Francesco Camarda, plus more.
articles.title: Brentford eye Norwich striker Sargent - Monday's gossip

articles.description: Barcelona fail to capitalise on results elsewhere in La Liga as they stay third after a goalless draw at Athletic Bilbao.
articles.title: Barcelona stay third after draw at Athletic Bilbao

articles.description: La Liga is analysing a video reportedly showing Real Madrid forward Vinicius Jr being racially abused by a fan during Saturday's draw at Valencia.
articles.title: La Liga examines alleged racist abuse of Vinicius Jr
